title: Missing Pieces by Nicola Haken
description:
Seventeen-year-old Maddie Davis has spent her whole life on the move. With an unstable mother who has a knack for making bad decisions, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never stayed in one place long enough to remember its postcode. But this time is differentÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ This time, she has been dragged half way across the world. 

Arriving in California and being forced to go back to school feels like stepping back in time. She wants to go homeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Until she meets Blaine Elwood... the stepson of an old family friend. Blaine appears to have it all. To the outside world, quarterback Blaine is rich, confident and has the Ã¢â‚¬Ëœarrogant bad boyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ image down to a tee. But nobody knows what goes on behind closed doors. Nobody ever can. 

He has vowed never to let anyone get too close Ã¢â‚¬â€œ let anyone discover how weak he is. So when new girl Maddie starts tugging at strings he didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know existed in his heart, his only option is to push her awayÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Until he realizes how much he needs her. Together, after being forced into adulthood from an early age, they begin to learn what it feels like to be young - to smile, to laugh... to love. 

So when shattered secrets and splintered lies start unraveling around them, will the trust theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve worked so hard to build be irreparably destroyed? Or will they realize they are two pieces of the same broken puzzle?

Genre: Romance
